title: Twitchâ€™s Relationship With Its Streamers Shows Its Cracks
description: The service recently said it was going to take a bigger cut of the money it shared with streamers. At an annual gathering in San Diego, they vented about the decision.
dc:creator: Kellen Browning
media:credit: John Francis Peters for The New York Times
media:description: At the recent TwitchCon in San Diego, streamers complained about changes the company has made.
